content:
There are many organizations providing aid and support to people in Gaza City. Some of the well-known aid organizations that people can donate to include:

1. UNICEF (United Nations Children's Fund)
2. ICRC (International Committee of the Red Cross)
3. Save the Children
4. World Vision
5. Oxfam
6. Mercy Corps 
7. Doctors Without Borders
8. Islamic Relief USA

These organizations are accepted globally for their charitable work and are committed to providing aid to people affected by violent conflicts, natural disasters, and emergencies.

However, it is recommended to research and verify organizations before donating, and to choose one that aligns with your values and priorities. You can also compare different organizations to see which ones are most effective in delivering aid to people in need.
